title: Geographic Coordinates
description: The geographic coordinates of a place or event.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Angular distance North or South from the earth's equator measured through 90 degrees. Latitude of location based on ISO 6709

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: The arc or portion of the earth's equator intersected between the meridian of a given place and the prime meridian and expressed in degrees. Longitude of location based on ISO 6709

timestamp.title: timestamp
timestamp.description: Date and Time based on IETF RFC 3339.

description.title: description
description.description:
Description of location such as "Free Standing Residential Home" 
or may be a URI that points to a more detailed description such as an address registry. Date and Time based on IETF RFC 3339.
